title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 504.4 - Classes of service not affected
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 504.4 - Classes of service not affected

State Regulations

The above sections as to notice of discontinuance of
service and refunds for advance payments do not apply to the following classes
of service when such services are the only ones rendered: (a) seasonal occupancy; (b) private fire protection; (c) air conditioning or
refrigeration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
504.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
